1.title: Queen Vashti's Refusal
1.keyEvent: Queen Vashti refuses King Ahasuerus' command

2.title: Esther Becomes Queen
2.keyEvent: Esther is chosen as queen after Vashti's removal

3.title: Haman's Plot
3.keyEvent: Haman plots to destroy the Jews

4.title: Esther's Resolve
4.keyEvent: Esther decides to approach the king for her people

5.title: Esther's Banquet
5.keyEvent: Esther invites the king and Haman to a banquet

6.title: Haman Honored
6.keyEvent: King honors Mordecai, unknowingly humiliating Haman

7.title: Haman's Downfall
7.keyEvent: Esther reveals Haman's plot; Haman is executed

8.title: New Decree Issued
8.keyEvent: Esther and Mordecai secure a decree to save Jews

9.title: Jews' Victory
9.keyEvent: Jews defend themselves and defeat their enemies

10.title: Mordecai's Promotion
10.keyEvent: Mordecai is exalted and honored by the king
